pull_request.title: Add marketing agent knowledge base
pull_request.body:
## Summary
- Adds a comprehensive marketing knowledge base document (`marketing.md`) for use by marketing agents
- Covers brand voice, audience personas, platform-specific strategies, competitive intelligence, and localized copy templates (Pidgin, Sheng, Nouchi) across all target ECOWAS markets

## Test plan
- [x] Document reviewed for accuracy against current platform features
- [ ] Verify no sensitive data is included
